entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times in the morning and afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
